posts.content:
Hi all

A bit cheeky and a long shot but my Daughter is flying out to Vegas end of this Month 29th from Heathrow and was wondering if anyone can pull strings to get them an Upgrade it's all cost so much so far, Please PM me if anyone can do anything, yes I know what everyone may say but if you can ask fellow dubbers then who else is there eh

Many thanks in advance if anyone can do anything.

Kind regards

Ron
we did vegas last year and flew with BA ,to be fair everything is free, booze and food and the seats aren't that bad even flying for 10 odd hours / I really wouldn't worry to much
Sons been twice with Thomas Cook long long flight especially on his own. No upgrades though:-(
